page.title: 16HOMELIFE MY WEEKEND
page.content: {ROSS EARLY AGE 11 {SATURDAY:}I like Saturday. I waken up at 7.30 a.m. have cornflakes, toast and milk for breakfast. I then play until my Mum wakens up. About 9 a.m. I go shopping in Dornoch with my Mum. We go to the newsagent, grocer, toy shop and to the butchers. When we get back to Camore I get my 35 pence pocket money which I spend on sweets at the local shop. After lunch which consists of sandwiches and a drink I play with my friends or on my bike. After a meal in the evening I watch the television before going to bed at 10 o'clock.{ {SUNDAY: }I get up at 8 o'clock on a Sunday and play. Mum makes breakfast about 10 o'clock. I play until dinner is made at 3 o'clock. Sometimes our family goes for a walk. I watch T.V. and have a snack supper before going to bed about 8 p.m. Sunday is boring.
